data.text: @missamandapell And I congratulate them for displaying such incredible taste.
this topic makes me feel a rage directly proportional to the amount of exclamation points used in this thread!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

especially when you are already wildly successful award-winning performers there is literally zero excuse for agreeing to do these films!!! it is nothing but ego and greed!!!! your ~artistic journey~ or whatever the fuck isn't more important than someone's assault!!!!!!!!!!
